Purpose of BEST Sites
The Veterans Benefits Administration (VBA) completed the consolidation of non-rating workload under multiple centralized processing sites in September 2022.  The purpose of the consolidation was to establish a streamlined operational approach to processing Veteran and beneficiary benefit adjustments, required benefit reviews, and unique eligibility decisions.
The designated sites are known as Benefit Eligibility Support Teams (BESTs).  The workload and jurisdiction for BEST is determined by the Office of Field Operations (OFO) and subject to adjustment, as needed.
Reference
:  For more information on BEST sites and workload, see the
Non-Rating Resource Job Aid
.
